name: Lifeguard Simulator 🛟
description:
Lifeguard Scenario Game by Ethan Chen

Lifeguard saving game developed in Unity 3D version 2020.3.28

Developed for Coding Minds Inc., for educational use only.

How to Play:

1. Controls: 

WASD and mouse to control the camera

Use the Esc (escape) key to show the cursor and select the correct options or numeric Keys (1-3)
